thread.title: BRIEF-iA Financial Group Announces Acquisition Of PPI Management

title: BRIEF-iA Financial Group Announces Acquisition Of PPI Management

organizations.name: brief-ia financial group announces acquisition of ppi
brief-ia financial group announces acquisition o
reuters) - industrial alliance insurance and financial services inc

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Industrial Alliance Insurance And Financial Services Inc:
* IA FINANCIAL GROUP ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF PPI MANAGEMENT INC. AND OFFERINGS OF COMMON AND PREFERRED SHARES
* INDUSTRIAL ALLIANCE INSURANCE AND FINANCIAL SERVICES - ‍BOUGHT DEAL OFFERING OF 2.5 MILLION SHARES FROM IA FINANCIAL GROUP AT PRICE OF $54.10 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
